member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.AndOperator
member.summary: Represents an operator that performs a logical-AND of its contained left and right expressions, but only evaluates its second expression if the first expression evaluates to true.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.BooleanExpression
member.summary: Represents an operator, operand or expression that results in one of two values - true or false.

member.summary: Evaluates the current expression against the specified .
member.param: The that the current expression will be evaluated against.
member.returns: True or false.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified
member.param: The expression that will be evaluated first.
The expression that will be evaluated last.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.AndOperator.Evaluate(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal)
member.summary: Performs the logical-AND of the left and right expressions.
member.param: The that the current expression will be evaluated against.
member.returns: True if both the left and right expressions evaluate to true, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.AndOperator.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the first expression that will be evaluated - the expression to the left of the operator.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.AndOperator.Right
member.summary: Gets or sets the second expression that will be evaluated - the expression to the right of the operator.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.WordExpression.Evaluate(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal)
member.summary:
Evaluates the current expression against the specified
by checking if it is in the role that matches the Value property of the current object.
member.param: The that the current expression will be evaluated against.
member.returns: True if the specified principal is in the role, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.WordExpression.Evaluate(System.Security.Principal.IIdentity)
member.summary:
Evaluates the current expression against the specified
by checking if its name matches the Value property of the current object.
member.param: The that the current expression will be evaluated against.
member.returns: True if the specified identity's name matches the value of the current expression, otherwise false.

member.summary: Evaluates the specified .
member.param: The that the current expression will be evaluated against.
member.returns: True if the principal contains an anonymous identity, otherwise false.
member.exception: This expression can only be evaluated against an identity. It has no meaning for a principal's roles because there is no common definition of an anonymous role.

The
against which the current expression will be evaluated.
member.returns: True if the specified principal's identity matches this expressions identity, otherwise false.
